SELECT l.id, l.name, l.create_date AS createDate, l.modify_date AS modifyDate FROM dj_baiscs_category_label l INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods_category c on FIND_IN_SET(l.id,c.category_label_ids) GROUP BY l.id ORDER BY createDate DESC
